bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Information technology-Telecommunications and information exchange between systems-Local and metropolitan area networks-Specific requirements Part 11: Wireless LAN Medium Access Control (MAC) and Physical Layer (PHY) Specifications: Amendment to IEEE P802.11-REVmcTM/D4.0: Fast Initial Link Setup

IEEE Draft Standard for Information technology-Telecommunications and information exchange between systems-Local and metropolitan area networks-Specific requirements Part 11: Wireless LAN Medium Access Control (MAC) and Physical Layer (PHY) Specifications: Amendment to IEEE P802.11-REVmcTM/D4.0: Fast Initial Link Setup

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This amendment defines mechanisms that provide IEEE Std 802.11 networks with fastinitial link setup methods that do not degrade the security offered by Robust Security NetworkAssociation (RSNA) already defined in IEEE Std 802.11.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
